name: Starblast
description: Fun, fast paced online multiplayer arcade space shooter. Take control of your spaceship, mine asteroids, increase your stats, upgrade to different types of spaceships with improved stats and weapons. Fight against other players and collect their gems.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.0 Ghz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: 1.2 Ghz CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 520 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 150 MB available space
